original_text: The Lord says to his people, ‘You are the people who must say that I am right. I have chosen you as my servant. I chose you so that you may know me, and also believe in me. Then you would understand that I am the true God. There has never been any other god except me, and there never will be. The Lord says to his people,
korean_text: 나 여호와가 말하노라 너희는 나의 증인, 나의 종으로 택함을 입었나니 이는 너희가 나를 알고 믿으며 내가 그인 줄 깨닫게 하려 함이라 나의 전에 지음을 받은 신이 없었느니라 나의 후에도 없으리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord says to his people
You are the people who must say that I am right
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내가 옳다고 말해야 하는 백성이니라

sentences.original_text: I have chosen you as my servant
I chose you so that you may know me
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 선택한 것은 너희가 나를 알게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: Then you would understand that I am the true God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 너희가 내가 참 하나님인 것을 깨달으리라

sentences.original_text: There has never been any other god except me
sentences.korean_translation: 나 외에는 다른 신이 결코 없었나니

sentences.original_text: The Lord says to his people
